Module com.pizza_group.project4
Package com.pizza_group.project4

Class StoreOrder

java.lang.Object
com.pizza_group.project4.StoreOrder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
public class StoreOrder extends Object implements Customizable
StoreOrder class contains all the information needed to handle store orders containing an observable list of order and the functions that help support actions for maintaining an order such as adding and removing orders from the store order.
Author:
Alexis Wilson, James Alba
